section.title: Commercial Support
section.para: The Discourse forum, irc, and documentation are helpful, but your company might require more in-depth assistance or custom development. If so feel free to contact the following freelance developers and companies directly to discuss a commercial arrangement.

tr.td: Made to Order Software Corp.: Quality software with easy to use interfaces from simple utilities to complex e-Business solutions.

section.para:
Many corporations use gtkmm to implement their products and internal projects. Here is a list of some of those companies:
MySQL - Databases
VMWare - Virtualization, network management
Amazon - MP3 Downloader
Garmin - Consumer navigation devices
Kongsberg Spacetec - satellite/meteorological
Solvo Ltd. - warehouse management systems
Northrup Grumman - military/defense
Jim Henson's Muppet Workshop - animatronics
Isotrol - electrical engineering
Linux Audio Systems - professional audio/music systems
Design Advantage - electrical/mechanical engineering
DME - mold engineering
Aplik - process engineering
Fiscal - fiscal Systems, POS
The Written Word - prebuilt software packages
SendOutCards.com - Specialized internal applications
EPIC Technology - Point Of Sale systems
Innoventis - Automotive systems

If you would like to be listed here please open a
GNOME/gnomemm-website issue or
merge request.
See also Apps built with GTK at the GTK website.
